languages.text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} reduction by +20%.
languages.original_text:
Персонаж с мира-кузни получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10% к шансу попадания и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} против целей, получивших попадание от одиночной атаки персонажа.
При {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критических попаданиях{/g} одиночных атак шанс попадания и снижение {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} увеличиваются на 20%.

traits.locale_text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% bonus to hit chance and dodge reduction against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful critical hits from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.

languages.text:
Fabrikweltcharaktere erhalten einen aufaddierbaren +10 %igen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die Trefferchance und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} gegen jedes Ziel, das sie mit einem Einzelzielangriff treffen.
Erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Treffer{/g} von Einzelzielangriffen erhöhen die Trefferchance und }Ausweichreduzierung um +20 %.
languages.original_text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.

traits.locale_text:
Fabrikweltcharaktere erhalten einen aufaddierbaren +10%igen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} gegen jedes Ziel, das sie mit einem Einzelzielangriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}.
Erfolgreiche kritische Treffer von Einzelzielangriffen erhöhen die Trefferchance und {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} um +20%.

languages.text:
Un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +10 % s'applique aux chances de toucher et à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des personnages des mondes forges qui touchent une cible avec une attaque à cible unique.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} réussis lors des attaques à cible unique augmentent de +20 % les chances de toucher et la réduction d'esquive.
languages.original_text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.

traits.locale_text:
Un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +10 % s'applique aux chances de toucher et à la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des personnages des mondes forges qui touchent une cible avec une attaque à cible unique.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} réussis lors des attaques à cible unique augmentent de +20 % les chances de toucher et la réduction d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.

languages.text:
铸造世界的角色使用单体攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}命中任何目标时，接下来针对该目标的攻击会获得+10%命中率与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}加成效果，此效果可叠加。
若是单体攻击造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}，则命中率与闪避减免加成效果提高为20%。
languages.original_text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.

traits.locale_text:
铸造世界的角色使用单体攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}任何目标时，接下来针对该目标的攻击会获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}加成效果，此效果可叠加。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}
若是单体攻击造成暴击，则命中率与{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}减免加成效果提高为20%。

languages.text:
Los personajes de mundos forja ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa del 10 % a su probabilidad de impacto y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} contra cualquier enemigo al que impacten con un ataque de un solo objetivo.
Los {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impactos críticos{/g} de ataques de un solo objetivo aumentan la probabilidad de impactar y la reducción de esquiva en un +20 %.
languages.original_text:
Forge world characters gain a stacking +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to hit chance and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against any target they hit with a single-target attack.
Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.

traits.locale_text:
Los personajes de mundos forja ganan una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa del 10 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} contra cualquier enemigo al que {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacten{/g} con un ataque de un solo objetivo.
Los impactos críticos de ataques de un solo objetivo aumentan la probabilidad de impactar y la reducción de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} en un +20 %.

languages.text:
工業惑星のキャラクターは単体対象攻撃を命中させたターゲットに対して、命中率と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}に+10%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る（累積可）
単体対象攻撃で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を出した場合、命中率と回避減少が+20%に増加する。

単体対象攻撃でクリティカルヒットを出した場合、命中率と{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}減少が+20%に増加する。

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж из мира-кузни получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g} против целей, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} от одиночной атаки персонажа.

languages.text:
Döküm dünyası karakterleri, tek hedefli saldırıyla vurdukları bir hedefe karşı vuruş olasılığına ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımına{/g} +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanırlar. Bu bonus, üst üste birikebilir.
Tek hedefli saldırılardan kaynaklı başarılı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşlar{/g}, vuruş olasılığını ve kaçınma azaltımını +%20 artırır.
languages.original_text:

Successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hits{/g} from single-target attacks increase the hit chance and dodge reduction by +20%.
